website_summaries.verdict: Chews that can be used for cats and dogs to help calm them without making them drowsy.
pros: Features L-Theanine and Vitamin B to help calm your cat without making him tired or changing his personality
Can be used for cats of any age
Great ahead of car travel, trips to the vet, or during thunderstorms
cons: Has a strong smell that some cats don't like, and can be hard to chew

website_summaries.verdict: A natural, flavorful solution for many stressed out and anxious canines; however, these chews may not work well when it comes to severe cases of separation anxiety.
pros: An easy-to-take chew that's made of all natural ingredients, and includes colostrum, vitamin B1, and L-Theanine that combine to reduce stress levels
Earns praise from dog owners for "taking the edge off" without causing drowsiness
cons: May have little effect, if any, for dogs with high levels of separation anxiety
Could cause upset stomach in sensitive dogs

website_summaries.verdict: If your cat likes the flavor of these all-natural chews, this product earns high marks for its ability to calm seriously stressed-out kitties.
pros: Reduces symptoms such as fear, scratching, marking, and more in a chew form that's made of natural ingredients
Combines vitamin B1, L-Theanine, and colostrum for a calming effect
Can be taken by cats and dogs
cons: Some cats won't eat them, and they don't produce noticeable results in all that do

customer_reviews.title: Calms My Cat
customer_reviews.text: This might not work perfectly for every pet, but it definitely works with mine! I give one chew to my 6.5 lb cat ~20 minutes before I need to do something stressful, like nail trimming, vet, or travel. It doesn't put her to sleep, it just makes her calm, like the bottle says. If the stressful event doesn't take very long (like a quick nail trim or something) she does go to sleep afterwards, but I mean she's a cat so that might've been on her schedule anyways. I don't think she's caught on to the fact that they do anything to her; she still likes the flavor and gobbles them up.
customer_reviews.author: Lif

customer_reviews.title: Could not go without it
customer_reviews.text: I have several rescues and they have a designated nap time everyday so these are awesome for relaxing them prior to nap time. I always keep 3-5 jars on hand as I could not go without them
customer_reviews.author: jhawk2703

customer_reviews.title: The calming medication has helped my very excited dog relax ...
customer_reviews.text: The calming medication has helped my very excited dog relax when new visitors arrive and when I come home. She isn't lethargic at all. It's enough to take the edge off without affecting her personality. I don't use it every day. Mostly when I expect company or will be gone for an extended period of time.
customer_reviews.author: McCrea

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could say it worked
customer_reviews.text: I had a rescue kitten with a lot of fear and anxiety. No clue what had happened to her before she was in the rescue program but she went in with a bunch of issues. Vet didn't want to give her kitty Prozac just yet so I started her on feliway and calming chews from vetriscience. Those worked better than these chews. I was giving her two chews a day then when I ran out, I looked to get a better priced chew and found these. Well she got worse after starting these chews, Almost back to when I first got her. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Charity

customer_reviews.title: They work and my cat loves them
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these! I had him on other calming treats and after a short time he started turning up his nose at them, when usually he'll eat anything. He gets really excited for these and they seem to be working - he handles us leaving town and us renovating the garage much better than without calming treats. I will be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Goentzel

customer_reviews.title: legit chill pills
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when I ordered this product, but we have a dog that was on so many prescription meds for anxiety -- that are expensive, as well as had a long list of instructions, do's & don'ts -- So I decided to give these a try. They are amazing! We have used them for two months now. I give one to each of our large dogs about an hour before bedtime. The dog with anxiety is doing wonderfully on only one a day (she's about 35 lbs) and no more expensive script meds!
customer_reviews.author: mrg

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I got an 18 months old Lab mix that was suffering from anxiety due to being in a outdoor kennel before 24/7 before I brought him home. He was suffering from anxiety not knowing what to do at his new home where he was allowed inside, given him a bed , toys, etc...Day three I started giving him a dose in the morning and he did so much better. It has been ten days since adoption and he is doing well. I will have this product on hand at all times. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Fitch

customer_reviews.title: Like having mother there.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful calming aid for my 5 lb. micro-dog. She loves the taste of the chews and they work very fast, within 10-15 minutes my little girl is back in the pink and I like the great ingredients in the capsules. The colostrum resembles the mothers` milk right after delivery and has lots of great nutrients in it and I think it also calms the offspring down. When our first dog had her puppies after her little ones had eating periods they would settle down and wait until it was time for another play period. This aid helps me control my dog`s behavior for the better.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L Laginess

customer_reviews.title: These WORK!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very hyper 3 year old pit mix. He's the ugly hyper, pulls on the leash until he chokes himself, scratches us until we bleed just playing. I give him two of these in the morning. We go for a nice civilized walk. They also make training easier. He's all about learning. They do not make him sleepy. My whole neighborhood loves these. He's no longer a wild man.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: 💕 Thank you for your highly superior products! Use them for several of there brand! Kudos💖
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great product and it really works? I've got a very high anxiety, sweet and adorable but, restless, nervous little Maltese. She hated fireworks, storms, staying home when someone goes out... She is the GREATEST little Angel that we love but these really are a "must have" product in our home! Best part... She does love love love them! But hit for our baby girl and with everything single penny! 💕 Thank you for your highly superior products! Use them on several items of this brand! Kudos to you all who work hard with getting this one another products that are truly amazing!
customer_reviews.author: ThriftyTigerLady

customer_reviews.title: Hyper then crashes
customer_reviews.text: We have a very energetic GSD that chews up her bed in her kennel when we are gone for a few hours, and I was hoping these would relieve her anxiety. They seem to make her more hyper for a few hours then she crashes and sleeps. I was needing something to give her an hour or so before we left that would last 2 hours or so. But she likes the flavor so I guess they will become treats. We have given her one above the recommended dosage but no change.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley A

customer_reviews.title: Its effective and my dogs like it as a treat!
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple dogs that hate going to the groomer or just simply to ride in the car. This is a natural and effective supplement that seems to just take the edge off. My Saluki girl used to get horribly car sick and still doesn't like riding unless she's in her crate. But sometimes I have to use the smaller car without the crate and this helps calm her somewhat. Not a drug, which is nice. The scent is kind of icky but the dogs don't mind.
customer_reviews.author: NorCal

customer_reviews.title: Cat hates them
customer_reviews.text: We have a new kitten in the house and bought these for our 3-yr-old Maine Coon to help with his adjustment and personality. He hates them, won't eat them, won't go near his dish when we try to hide them in his food. We think counseling, therapy, maybe some reading will help his personality...jazz seems to help. At any rate, he hates these more than the new kitten.
customer_reviews.author: Kabbie

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to be a solution for my cat's separation anxiety, but it seems they build up a tolerance to it. When I first gave it to him, he was noticeably calmer and we didn't have issues with him peeing on anything. Now I have to give him at least three per day to notice any effect and he isn't as calm as those first few days. He has also started peeing on various things that have my scent on them again. Guess my search will continue, but I will keep using this in the meantime.
customer_reviews.author: Elie

customer_reviews.title: Effective and nicely priced
customer_reviews.text: I really am concerned that they wanted me to comment on the flavor which I don't actually have personal knowledge of. But my ginormous German shepherd who eats everything and my husky mix that is picky will both eat these without coaxing. I would give one at a time at first because they seem very effective. Shepherd has anxiety in the car and when separated from my husband and she's over 100 pounds and one is plenty. We have tried other brands (some more expensive) and have been disappointed. No longer carried at my pet store and was happy to find on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy C

customer_reviews.title: Calming Chews
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these before, They help my little dog to chill a little. She is Chihuahua & Toy Poodle so kinda high strung. I was glad to see a good sale price and got 2 bottles. They smelled weird and different than previous purchases. My dog didn’t want to eat them. She usually thinks they are a treat & does tricks for them. Not sure what they changed but something is different. I hope they go back to a better smelling formula that probably tasted better too.😁👍
customer_reviews.author: Lexy Lover

customer_reviews.title: It takes a couple of days to build up in system Calming Pills
customer_reviews.text: My one cat won’t eat them The other cat runs to get them I feed her one and break in half along with her other treats My dog eats two along with two brewers yeast garlic pills and her treat it takes about a week to build up in their system the one cat and dog are no longer fighting and hyper the other cat I put a calming collar and took a week to work but he doesn’t fight either the garlic brewers yeast pill works on the dog only I’ve been using them every day for a year and half and have no fleas on any of the animals
customer_reviews.author: alice mangus

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: This really does help my dogs, one will just sits by my feet and shakes a lot but after I give her about 1 1/2 (she is about 18lbs) she doesn't shake as much and seems to handle the Thunderstorms a little better. I does not make them sleepy just calmer. I bought a big bottle for our car trips this summer cause the other dog does not like car rides so maybe this will help him.
customer_reviews.author: KathyRC

customer_reviews.title: These work and dogs love them.
customer_reviews.text: These work very well and my dog’s love them. I gave 4 stars because I found some here on Amazon that cost a little bit less and work as well. Look at the number of tablets in the container when considering the price. I bought this in a 90 count and it was a pretty good deal. Perfect for stress from Thunder,fireworks, traveling, going to the vet etc. NOTE: It does take a couple of hours to kick in fully so keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Taebaker

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Honestly wasn't sure how these were going to go over. My dog loves the flavor and gobbles them right up. She is a rescue who is scared of everything and these help so much. I think they help her sleep more soundly too. I'll be purchasing these again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: AniDart

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I gave my little blind diabetic dog one. She weighs about 23 lbs. She was as hung over as I feel when I take benadryl. She was walking into walls and peeing in the floor. I don't know if this caused both problems but she was definitely hung over. I did notice however, she slept. Oh did she sleep! I am giving 5 stars but not sure if thats right since we just got them and tried only one time.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: works for my chihuahua
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my chihuahua who has suffered from a chronic cough/lung issues for years. We discovered that her cough calmed when we calmed her down. I have been giving her this since I received it and have been able to cut down the prednisone she has been on for the cough issue. I think I may be able to get her completely off the prednisone. Wish I would have figured out that the cough was a result of stress.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Knight

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: We recently adopted a dog, she's kinda high strung. She's good, but she has her moments. She's still young.... So, I originally got these for my cat. She didn't like them. Well, because my dog is slightly crazy, we gave her a half tab. Oh my stars! It knocked her out. So, we cut them smaller and she is so much better. Not sleepy, just easier to deal with. I'm glad I didn't give them away.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly D. Chmil

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these I have a pit bull that I rescued who is petrified of fireworks, thunder and other loud sounds. I can give him the proper dose of these and he calms down. Instead of roaming all over the house he finds his spot and goes to sleep. My Pekingese is old and arthritic and gets cranky due to his pain. Even though he gets pain and anti inflammatory meds the calm tabs seem lo help more. Highly recommend these
customer_reviews.author: Theresa R.

customer_reviews.title: Kind of large size
customer_reviews.text: My cats liked it the first time I gave it to them, but that that, they didn’t eat it. Not sure why. The tablets are a bit larger than the treats they normally get, so that may be a factor. I may try them again and cut them in half. They can be given almost as supplements to animals (cats or dogs) if you prefer. Seem to tolerate them well, but don’t love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Bellis

customer_reviews.title: Works, for dogs and cats!
customer_reviews.text: My dog and cat both love these, and it calms them. I wouldn’t want to be without them.
customer_reviews.author: Carastan

customer_reviews.title: One of the best things I've ever done for my dog
customer_reviews.text: One of the best things I've ever done for my dog. Working with a behaviorist on Isolation Anxiety for my fractious little pupper, and these let her be a lot less frantic about life. She's able to settle down, to entertain herself with the puzzles I leave her, and to be less upset. Combine these with a good behavior management and training plan, and they will definitely help an anxious dog! Be aware: If your dog is allergic to rosemary oil this contains some.
customer_reviews.author: Rosslyn

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these
customer_reviews.text: My dog would get destructive when left alone. We tried CBD and these, and these treats are great for her. They calm her down without totally making her out of it. We make sure to give her these before we leave along with a kong and put music on and she has been great since!
customer_reviews.author: NogV

customer_reviews.title: Really helps my dog during thunderstorms
customer_reviews.text: My dog as she has gotten older has a lot more issues with thunder - If I know we are going to get a storm I will give her a couple of these treats and maybe a third, depending on the storm. She’s an 86 pound dog so you prob don’t need to give as much to a smaller dog. This really seems to calm her down, but I do think it makes her a bit sleepy.
customer_reviews.author: N Drew

customer_reviews.title: Last a long time
customer_reviews.text: These have lasted a long time. My dogs really seems to like them. I give them one a couple of nights a week. I can't speak on pain relief my dogs are both pretty young (one is only a year and one is 4-6 years old). I don't know about the flavor but like I said the dogs like them. There a ton in the container, too.
customer_reviews.author: LBBM

customer_reviews.title: Keeps 'em on an even keel, so to speak
customer_reviews.text: Stuff seems to work - I use it when we're heading out to shop, visit or just joy-riding. Keeps my nervous kitties calm while we're out. Our cats are about 10-11 human years old and we didn't get much company in the past, so Puss 'n' Boots were skittish when folks came by. The past five years, however, has seen our our visitor quotas' gone up, and initially the cats freaked out. They're getting used to the company, but being alone? Not so much. These help when we head out and it seems to work as we don't have to hunt for them when we come home. Sometimes they even greet us at the door! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Merrlyn

customer_reviews.title: Calm Down Pup!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only calming treat I've tried that works. Some seem to put my pup in a daze, and some don't work at all. But these help with his (light) anxiety and long travel. And sometimes at night when he just won't go to bed and he's keeping everyone up, it calms him down enough to go to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: solomominheels

customer_reviews.title: Made my cat and dog puke
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product for the first 2 days for both my cat and German Shepard. By the third day they both vomited their dinner. I wish it didn’t cause such stomach upset. I wanted to like this product.
customer_reviews.author: J Perdue

customer_reviews.title: I wanted so much for this product to be accepted but...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted so much for this product - vet recommended! - to replace the crunchy, salty, low-nutrition grocery-store variety. But the kitties, even with empty food bowls and no kibble all day, either sniffed and tried to bury the halved bits, or tasted and THEN tried to bury the halved bits. Darn! Tried again the next morning, same same...thank you Amazon for the refund w/o need to return...
customer_reviews.author: Linden Hills Girl

customer_reviews.title: Works okay on 3 cats
customer_reviews.text: Jealousy reigns amidst 3 cats. These “treats” seem to calm everybody down. Unfortunately they love em and often want more! Trying to diet the chubbies! 😣
customer_reviews.author: ZED

customer_reviews.title: Have a dog with anxiety issues?
customer_reviews.text: These have been great for our GSD who has bad anxiety with Thunder and other sounds outside the house. He enjoys eating them almost as if they are a treat (be careful) but they are great for leaving the house during storms. We usually can tell a big difference before he has them and after by watching on our blink camera. I would recommend them to anyone needing a little relaxation for their pup!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: RATING IS BASED ON MY PUPPY
customer_reviews.text: My rating is based on the experience with MY PUPPY. I gave my puppy (5 month old, 5lb Shih Poo) 1/2 of a tablet and she got so lethargic, which scared me. Lets just say I will not be giving my puppy this anymore, I would much rather deal with her craziness then her getting sick or her acting very lethargic.
customer_reviews.author: D. G.

customer_reviews.title: Works to calm hyper-active Mastiff mix
customer_reviews.text: Works well to calm my hyper-excitable dog. I rescued her at 1 year old, pitbull/ Presa Canario Mastiff mix... a little too big to be leaping through the house.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Barclay

customer_reviews.title: My 5 yr old pitbull terrier lab mix. is ...
customer_reviews.text: My 5 yr old pitbull terrier lab mix.is hyper.stresses eats chews kids bike ,B'bque brush,flower box, firewood logs,broom, u name it! Even the playhouse..so I give her 70lb body 2 of these per day.keeps her calm. Already had a 4$K vet bill. Cant do this again. Using for 9 mon.now.still helps a lot. MY Twiggy girl is not into much into trouble now.
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Helps with Anxiety
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful! My little Yorkie has extreme anxiety when my grandchildren visit. I wanted something that would help her calm down and this product does the trick. I have to give her more than suggested because she is so hyper. I will be ordering this product again.
customer_reviews.author: V. Belanger

customer_reviews.title: Works Well But Caused Itching😢
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at calming my pup, but a side affect of one of the ingredients “may cause itching” which happened to my dog. 😢 Sadly I had to discontinue use which is why I only give it 3 stars. Gave the unused portion to a friend. I don’t think her dog has had any problems.
customer_reviews.author: mineto4

customer_reviews.title: I’m not sure they actually do anything
customer_reviews.text: This sort of works. Pros - my dog and one insane evil cat love the taste and eat them right up. Cons- I’m not sure they actually work. My cat is still evil after eating one, and I give my dog three but he’s still a neurotic mess. Woah is me 😭
customer_reviews.author: Rhea M.Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: helped my cat with anxiety!
customer_reviews.text: I took in a few stray kittens over the years and I have one who, you can tell was battling like anxiety. She wasn't sure on any of her decisions, always looking around to see who's near her. Now after taking them she actually comes up to us and goes and lays where the other cats are. Which is totally awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really works well
customer_reviews.text: When she gets grumpy and demanding we give her 1/3 of one tablet and she's mellow and loving for a few days.
customer_reviews.author: tim t

customer_reviews.title: Unsure
customer_reviews.text: I can’t rate taste, I’m sorry but I’m not eating a dog treat. Lol. But my moms dog behaves very good it seems when we are gone no complaints from neighbors about her load barking. Thank you for that. And I’m sure our neighbors thank you too.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Petrice

customer_reviews.title: Great for vet or groomer visits
customer_reviews.text: With 4 cats, I need this many. Each gets three prior to any vet or grooming visiting. Turned one of mine from being labeled "aggressive" at vet to being cooperative. Doesn't sedate, all like the flavor. Has also helped one come out of her shell after being raised in a cage before going to animal shelter.
customer_reviews.author: H. L. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Mellowed her right out!
customer_reviews.text: Mellowed my nail trimming phobic goldendoodle right out! She was unruly and impossible to even catch when she saw nailtrimmers before taking two of these. Afterwards, she was able to lie down with her head in my daughter lap while i quickly trimmed all four paws! Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: DCS

customer_reviews.title: Very calming!
customer_reviews.text: These have helped immensely with calming a manic cat that used to be a biter. Now he is content without being sleepy or drugged, and just a much better temperament with eating one of these in the early evening and one in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: HappyBabette

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure it works, wish the taste was different
customer_reviews.text: Some of my cats will eat them and some won't go near them because of the smell. Maybe if you made them with a flavor that's acceptable to both cats and dogs. My cats that will eat them seem to act more relaxed after taking them.
customer_reviews.author: CBY

customer_reviews.title: Our furbabies get one every day!
customer_reviews.text: I love giving healthy "treats" to our furbabies. They each get one of these every night before bed, they think they are a treat, I know they have vitamins and other ingredients that are beneficial to their wellbeing.
customer_reviews.author: Farm Girl

customer_reviews.title: Hit and miss
customer_reviews.text: We got them for our 100lb mutt. He has separation anxiety (or is just super happy to see us and follow us around everywhere we go). It didn't work so much for the separation anxiety part, but he was super chill during the fireworks. So it's a toss up.
customer_reviews.author: K. Sylvester

customer_reviews.title: Helps calm
customer_reviews.text: My cats like these calming treats and seems to help them mellow out when agitated.
customer_reviews.author: WR

customer_reviews.title: Relieve dog anxiety with ease.
customer_reviews.text: My beagle would go into a major panic attack during fireworks or thunderstorms. With only one pill before events, she remains calm and even sleeps during the events. Excellent product. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Perry L. Chocklett

customer_reviews.title: Calming chews
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these calming chews for my German Shepherd for a year or so and they help a lot during thunderstorms and fireworks. They calm her, take the edge off. She is very anxious during these times, without this product she would pace continuously. Now she usually finds a place and lays down after I give them to her.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: One of my cats is very feisty and would get a little crazy with the other cat or with me. He's been calmer since I started using this (some years now). He gets a tablet every night, more if he is going to the vet. He likes it and will wait for it by his dish.
customer_reviews.author: KL in MA

customer_reviews.title: Trying to keep them “calm”
customer_reviews.text: I have a four year old cat, Sandy, who is very anxious. These Calming chews seem to help him a lot. He loves them and eats them with gusto. I give him two in the morning. They don’t drug him or slow him down, but he does seem more mellow and gets along better with the other cats. I always keep these on hand. I sometimes give them to my 10 yr old dog, Shela, too. She is very uneasy around holidays when there are noises in the neighborhood like firecrackers, etc.
customer_reviews.author: J Bell

customer_reviews.title: made my dog hyper
customer_reviews.text: He tends to be a bit of a kujo so I thought these might calm him. No, he was his usual hyper self and it gave him loose stools. He did like the taste and maybe it would work for less high strung dogs. Just not mine.
customer_reviews.author: shon getz

customer_reviews.title: Less aggressive but still feisty
customer_reviews.text: These need to be given to your pet regularly to notice any difference and for at least a month. My calico cat is not quite as aggressive towards my other cat, but still feisty. There is no sleepy or drowsy reaction that I can tell. Overall a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: DesertRat

customer_reviews.title: Very bad product, made both my dogs sick and lethargic
customer_reviews.text: Very bad product, made both my dogs sick and lethargic. If I could do no stars I would. Missed my window of opportunity to return it, bummed by that ...Would never buy again!!!!! T Collins
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works but....
customer_reviews.text: I have a almost 5 month old kitten. I gave him 1 yesterday. After about 30 minutes he just went to sleep. He slept in a place he never has before. And slept a long time. It definitely calms them down.
customer_reviews.author: Christiephelps

customer_reviews.title: Cat will NOT eat them
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats that have started fighting recently. I bought these, Cat 1 ate on the first day - never again. Cat 2 would never eat them. I've tried to bury in wet food and they will not eat it. I WISH this worked, but unfortunately...
customer_reviews.author: Stephen K.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This is the only product that works on my dog in thunderstorms & on 4th of July. It makes her very sleepy & calm. No toxic pharma drugs for my fur baby.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: life saver
customer_reviews.text: Our dog struggles with fear aggression, after about a week of getting one treat a day she's now had 3 successful play dates with no fear, and no reduced energy or interest.
customer_reviews.author: HMCharlie

customer_reviews.title: Can't Say Enough Great Things About Pet Naturals of Vermont!
customer_reviews.text: Pet Naturals of Vermont has Great Products, Our Cat Loves The Calming and Hairball Treats, They Really Work!!!
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: ... have completely changed one of our cats for the better. She has no anxiety
customer_reviews.text: These have completely changed one of our cats for the better. She has no anxiety. Comes out and plays including by our German Shepherd that she was terrified of for the past few years.
customer_reviews.author: M. Boyce

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for us :(
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my cat who is ridiculously anxious (she’s a rescue), but unfortunately she won’t go anywhere near the treat. This particular cat will also eat anything & everything so I disregarded the other reviews that has a similar issue. I’ve tried mashing it putting it in tuna water, sliced turkey, and her favorite wet cat food. I tried to see if my other cat (who is picky) will it eat it , but she won’t go near the product as well.
customer_reviews.author: katherine benavidez

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Professional
customer_reviews.text: This had everything I liked and was perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Help my pets
customer_reviews.text: I have used this calming treats for my dogs for several years now and really like them. They do not make them sleepy but help by taking the edge off their anxiety during thunderstorms or fireworks, etc. I also love that these are all natural.
customer_reviews.author: Petra

customer_reviews.title: Surprised!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It works....My 110 lb pup is calm after a dose. Impressed
customer_reviews.author: Trista

customer_reviews.title: Peace and quiet in the car.
customer_reviews.text: My dog readily ate them. Used for extended car trip. Within half hour she would settle down and rest for a couple of hours. On full travel days used a calming chew about every 4 hours with no ill effects.
customer_reviews.author: a/k/a Bevie

customer_reviews.title: Pet Naturals of Vermont - Calming, Behavioral Support Supplement for Dogs
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have always purchased them at a local Wal-Mart, but when I found them here on Amazon, I was elated. Great price as well.
customer_reviews.author: JANIS L KRUGER

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for anxiety
customer_reviews.text: We already used these and our dogs love them but they do really them with help with anxiety . Best price going and it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This works well for our dog. She is frightened by fireworks and thunder.
customer_reviews.text: This works well for our dog. She is frightened by fireworks and thunder. She's 35lbs and I give her two. Unlike another brand, she readily eats these without adding peanut butter. I was surprised that they worked--I'm unfamiliar with the ingredients and none seemed to be what I'd think was a sedative.
customer_reviews.author: Average Guy

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: These are the ONLY calming treats that work for our dogs. We need to give a higher dose but the packaging says that is ok. Helps our dogs calm down at night and sleep well.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Great item and received quickly!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very active hyper year old vat! These supplements are wonderful! They make him calmer almost as soon as he eats them! I use half at a time and it is amazing what a difference it makes in his behavior! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Suzieb

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It does kind of smell like some kind of medicine and because of that my dog doesn’t really eat it as much unless I drop it down and walk away from it then maybe
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Cats Like Them, and They Work
customer_reviews.text: I gave these four stars because they've become too pricey for me to buy any longer. Luckily, my young cats have mostly outgrown their flaky behavior, so it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Alix

customer_reviews.title: Completely useless
customer_reviews.text: The dog likes it, but I’m seeing absolutely no change in behavior. This is way, WAY to expensive for a dog treat (which is all it is good for as far as I can tell).
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Maybe this will work for pets that are only slightly anxious, but my experience is that it didn’t make a dent with our cats. It was basically the equivalent of giving a baby aspirin to someone with a migraine. They liked the taste but it didn’t calm them at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mikala

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: My cats like them and get excited when I shake the bottle unlike other calming treats I've purchased. They are a bit big, so I break them in 4s for easier eating. They work especially in stressful situations like fireworks or hurricanes. Helps with car transport to the vet or anywhere else for that matter.
customer_reviews.author: kit10kel

customer_reviews.title: It's a nope from the cat.
customer_reviews.text: My cat hates it won't eat not at all tried putting in his food i tried putting in with his favorite treats and he won't eat it or the food it's in
customer_reviews.author: Terra

customer_reviews.title: Great for my dog's anxiety...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these years ago in a pouch for my lab with anxiety..... Now he's older so I bought the container...Thank you for a great product....
customer_reviews.author: wyominggal

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work on cats!
customer_reviews.text: At first my 3 of the 6 cats are it for like a day or two then all of them learned and the smell is horrible like I gagged when I open it like why would any animal want to eat it unless u force the treat down their throats
customer_reviews.author: Lucykirito0917

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Literally saved me from having to rehome one of my boys. He was so nervous and always on edge. It caused so many fights with my other dogs. Giving these in the morning and an occasional evening one on the bad days has allowed me to keep my furry family together ❤
customer_reviews.author: Terri Scott

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Works well on my dog. If kitty will eat it, she'll chill too.
customer_reviews.author: Holli

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: My fur kids love them and wake me up each day for it. So that how I’ll answer to the flavor of them. I use them religiously, everyday every month.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: They like it
customer_reviews.text: I feed two to my dog and one to each of my cats. They all eat these like they taste good. I am not sure how much it calms them down, but I treat it like a treat.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work at all
customer_reviews.text: Product does not help my over hyper dog at all. There has been no change since I've started these treats as per the directions on the bottle. Dog loves the flavor though, so I guess theres that.
customer_reviews.author: DRW

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these did nothing for our cat. Additionally, he developed skin lesions after taking this. They went away after an expensive vet visit and stopping the treats. Was a real bummer, but I guess for the price, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Collin

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: I paid the same price for only 30 chews at a chain Pet store. These do seem to calm my neurotic dog down. He has been much more mellow.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how I feel about this product yet
customer_reviews.text: 2 of my pets have some pretty severe anxiety issues..my jackrussell/poodle mix Frank and my female cat Hope. I always prefer the natural approach when it comes to my precious pets, but not sure this product works very well..maybe mildly.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: These calming treats are a great value! I have 6 cats and 3 out of 6 like these treats. They seem to make my anxious cats calmer.
customer_reviews.author: Shaina

customer_reviews.title: I've never seen anything like it. During those times I have found
customer_reviews.text: My Golden Retriever, Daisy, is a big baby when it comes to thunder and lightning. She completely comes undone, I've never seen anything like it. During those times I have found, given a little time to work, that these calming morsels will really calm her down enough so she will lie down and rest until it's over. I am so glad I was told about these. They really help!
customer_reviews.author: Cozy Mystery Lover

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I have a black lab puppy and was looking for something to help with her insane energy when we get visitors. Didn't work for us and made her throw up.
customer_reviews.author: Lakai

customer_reviews.title: Dog likes them.
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly, good price, dog likes them, but they don’t help much with anxiety reduction when it’s storming outside.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cats didn't like the flavor
customer_reviews.text: My cats wouldn't eat it so I dipped in tuna fish water and placed tuna on top. None of our 4 cats would eat it that way either. They ate the tuna though. Would not recommend as a cat treat at all.
customer_reviews.author: kakes

customer_reviews.title: Great as a treat, but takes time to calm down a kitten
customer_reviews.text: My kitten loves these as a treat but it takes time for it to digest and get into her system to actually calm her down.
customer_reviews.author: Widower62

customer_reviews.title: Isn’t working
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I gave my dog this she has been pacing the floor all day I don’t think it’s working for her I think it made it worse
customer_reviews.author: Tamesia Hall

customer_reviews.title: Works for the ones that would eat them.
customer_reviews.text: For the cats that would eat it, it seemed to help. Most of my five (yes just the five) could have cared less about them and refused to eat them.
customer_reviews.author: RogueHistorian

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works extremely well. Cat will eat these by themselves or chopped into normal food. Really calms him down.
customer_reviews.author: JAC

product_meta.title: Pet Naturals of Vermont - Calming, Behavioral Support Supplement for Dogs and Cats, 160 Bite Sized Chews
feature_bullets: Calming for dogs and cats has been formulated to help manage everyday stress and behavioral issues in a natural way.
Calming can be given every day or as needed and, is safe to double or triple the dose in times of increased stress.
Calming soft chews are naturally flavored with real chicken liver, so even the Pickiest pet will love it. Each bottle includes 160 chews.
Calming chews are recommended for pets that have issues with car rides, trips to the veterinarian, strangers, separation issues, storm stress and fireworks.
All pet Natural’s of Vermont products are manufactured in the USA and distributed from our offices in the Green Mountains of Vermont.
